mapper.select: SELECT BLOG_NO, IMAGE_PATH, FILESYSTEM_NAME FROM BLOG_IMAGE_T WHERE IMAGE_PATH = '/blog/' || TO_CHAR(SYSDATE - 1, 'YYYY/MM/DD')

SELECT A.BLOG_NO, A.TITLE, A.CONTENTS, A.USER_NO, A.HIT, A.IP, A.CREATED_AT, A.MODIFIED_AT, A.EMAIL FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY B.BLOG_NO DESC) AS RN, B.BLOG_NO, B.TITLE, B.CONTENTS, B.USER_NO, B.HIT, B.IP, B.CREATED_AT, B.MODIFIED_AT, U.EMAIL FROM USER_T U INNER JOIN BLOG_T B ON B.USER_NO = U.USER_NO) A WHERE A.RN BETWEEN #{begin} AND #{end}
